CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Testing and Validation stage positioned above or below the Prototype Development stage?
SRP.A: The Testing and Validation stage is positioned {below} the Prototype Development stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Testing and Validation?
VE.A: The value of stage Testing and Validation is {38%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Final Design Approval?
VE.A: The value of stage Final Design Approval is {30%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Design Phase, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Final Design Approval, with a value of {30%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation is {27%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development is {35%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval is {8%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 51%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Design Phase} stage has {100%}, the {Prototype Development} stage has {65%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 51%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Testing and Validation} stage has {38%}, the {Final Design Approval} stage has {30%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 34% and 51%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation, or from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prototype Development} to {Testing and Validation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation, from stage Design Phase to Prototype Development, or from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Design Phase} to stage {Prototype Development} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Design Phase} and {Prototype Development} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Testing and Validation} and {Final Design Approval} stages.
